sections.title: Overview
sections.content: Asynchronous processing for long-running or high-volume tasks using queues, workers, and scheduling.

sections.title: Idempotency & Ordering
sections.content: Idempotent handlers with deterministic keys; exactly-once illusion via at-least-once and dedupe; partitioning for ordering.

sections.title: Retries & DLQ
sections.content: Exponential backoff; max attempts; poison message handling; DLQ monitoring and replay tooling.

sections.title: Scheduling & Concurrency
sections.content: CRON and ad-hoc triggers; rate limits, concurrency caps, and worker autoscaling; graceful shutdown.

sections.title: Observability & Ops
sections.content: Per-queue dashboards, lag and throughput metrics; structured logs; alerting on failures and DLQ growth.
